app.env:
app.title=ETRACS 2.5 build 2.5.05.02-003 (${lgu_name}) app.host=${app_server_ip}:18070 app.cluster=osiris3 app.context=etracs25 app.help=http://${app_server_ip}:18080/help app.loader=com.rameses.osiris2.client.OsirisAppLoader readTimeout=300000 connectionTimeout=5000 filemgmt.enabled=false
ws.host=${app_server_ip}:18060 #res.host=${app_server_ip}
socketio.host=${socketio_server_ip}:7080
entity.app.host=${app_server_ip}:18070 entity.app.context=etracs25
bpls.app.host=${app_server_ip}:18070 bpls.app.context=etracs25
rpt.app.host=${app_server_ip}:18070 rpt.app.context=etracs25
epayment.build=2.5.01.02.06 epayment.app.host=${app_server_ip}:18070 epayment.app.context=epayment
